summary: Summon up to 30 crazy miniature trolls whose sole purpose in life is to distract your enemies.
descriptionHtml:
The Sanguine Trolls staff, a long-forgotten and mystical artifact that comes complete with instruction book, has been found and lies on the table with the big map on the second floor of Dragonsreach.
Upon taking this staff, you can summon ten miniature trolls who, upon their rude awakening, will attack nearby foes for you. They don\'t do much damage, but will surely prove to be a mighty distraction.
There can be 30 trolls at a time.

Note:
If you are updating from a version before 4, you will need to unequip and re-equip the staff if you are only summoning one or two. This just involves clicking it off and on in your inventory.
If you downloaded a version before 4 and want to undo the granted Twin Souls perk, type player.removeperk 000D5F1C in the console.
author: 1Hat

files.name: Old version 2
files.changelogHtml:
Changed staff charge time from 0.5 seconds to 0.2 seconds
Increased running speed of trolls
Removed glitchy staff description

files.name: Old version 3
files.changelogHtml: Removed unintended requirement to have Elemental Potency perk for staff to function

files.name: Latest version
files.changelogHtml: Removed requirement to add the Twin Souls/Trollmaster perk through console. Twin Souls perk is back to how it used to be.
